overview:
Improving medication adherence through individualized intervention targeting

Allazo Health’s analytics service helps clients turn data into actionable insight, revealing the most effective way to influence the behavior of each individual member.

Improving medication adherence reduces medical spending, raises Medicare Star Ratings, increases HEDIS scores, and creates a better overall member experience for health insurers and PBMs. Despite the myriad of interventions employed today, increasing medication adherence still proves difficult.

Allazo Health’s AllazoEngine™ combines cutting-edge behavioral science research, industry expertise, and advanced predictive analytics to deeply understand how people will behave and how interventions can change that behavior. We know that each individual is unique and that their responses to interventions are unique as well. AllazoEngine™ leverages existing member data to both anticipate medication non-adherence and forecast the most effective intervention strategy for each individual.
